DOC.HEADLINE: BANKRUPTCY , FORECLOSURE : TRENDS OF THE ' 90S
DOC.TEXT: Orange County bankruptcy filings were down slightly in 1993 , but the figures remain well above those of the previous decade . Residential mortgage foreclosures increased nearly 70 % in the past five years . Bankruptcy Filings 06 # 10 , 07 # 07 , 08 # 08 , 08 1989 1990 1991 1992 1993 * Chap . 7 5 # 957 7 # 314 9 # 918 12 # 066 11 # 029 Chap . 11 362 309 457 416 368 Chap . 12 1 Chap . 13 1 # 987 1 # 719 1 # 993 1 # 838 1 # 619 Total 8 # 306 9 # 342 12 # 368 14 # 320 13 # 017 * Jan . through Nov . Bankruptcy Glossary Chapter 7 : Allows businesses and individuals to keep some personal_property and , in some instances , a home and automobile . But they must sell the rest to pay_off at least part of what is owed . Chapter 11 : Provides businesses protection from creditors while reorganizing operations and establishing a payment plan . Chapter 12 : Special category for farms . Chapter 13 : Allows individuals protection from creditors and allows payments to be extended up_to fice years .
